data.actual_result: Discord softlocks. You can scroll up and down the list, but nothing else.
data.expected_result: The member list should close and Discord shouldn’t softlock
data.short_description: Discord softlocks when I tap on the “members” button and quickly go on a profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap on the “members” button - Quickly tap on and off a profile - Tap on the “members” button again
